document_data.name: Kalia
document_data.mainbody: '''Kalia''' was a high-ranking officer of [[Muktar]] in the [[Turmish]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kalia was a member of the [[Champions of Muktar]]. She was also a high priestess of [[Myrkul]].
document_data.History:
In [[1358 DR]] Kalia and his fellow Champions arranged the trap inside [[Fort Blood]] planned by the self-styled king of [[Muktar]], [[Yrkhetep|Hetep]], to eliminate an adventuring party well-known in [[Golconda]].
Later she commanded her brigade in the [[Battle of Wilma Pass]].
document_data.Personality: Kalia liked showing her face to the sacrificed victims she made to her god.
